## AlexaPlatformData.isAvailableWorldwide property

Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest publishing information, if true the skill will be distributed in all countries covered by the specified locales.

See [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html\#publishinginformation](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html#publishinginformation)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isAvailableWorldwide?: boolean;
```
